DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness CelluTome Epidermal Harvesting System Autologous Skin Grafting Chronic Wound Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine effectiveness CelluTome™ epidermal harvest system outpatient skin graft system select patient versus inpatient skin graft harvest . This multi-center prospective , longitudinal case series comparison historical control . In study , subject receive treatment protocol regardless institution . This include routine wound photography . Ongoing heal process record review . The secondary objective study establish ideal donor site size , recipient site size ideal patient population ( especially high operative risk patient ) would benefit use CelluTome™ Epidermal Harvesting System .
